lines.text: [Cavanaugh is trying to get Phillip to go the men's group]
Only you could drag me to something like this. It's not so easy to get out of the house.
You just open the door, and you're out!
[Solly is telling the men's group about he and his wife swapping partners]
I said let's switch partners. It was my idea, right? Ok. We did it. It wasn't the first time. Only this time, she was moaning with love.
It was terrible, man. I lost my erection.
I left and my wife comes running after, 'Solly! Solly Berliner!' She said, it's not her fault. It was my idea. I hit her, I said, that's my idea too!
Go ahead. Pick up the phone. Make an ass of yourself.
Hello, Hannah! I got laid tonight. Is that ok with you, darling?
